briefTitle: Study Comparing Imiquimod Cream, 3.75% to Zyclara® (Imiquimod) Cream, 3.75% in the Treatment of Actinic Keratosis
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Parallel-Group, Vehicle-Controlled, Multicenter Study Comparing Imiquimod Cream, 3.75% to Zyclara® (Imiquimod) Cream, 3.75% in the Treatment of Actinic Keratosis of the Face or Balding Scalp
summary: To determine the comparability of the safety and efficacy of Imiquimod Cream, 3.75% and Zyclara (imiquimod) Cream, 3.75% (the reference listed drug) in subjects with actinic keratosis (AK) of the face or balding scalp. It will also be determined whether the efficacy of each of the two active treatments is superior to that of the Vehicle cream.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Treatment Success/Failure at Visit 5/Week 14
